name: cordova.tests.plugins
description: A sample Apache Cordova application that responds to the deviceready event.

scripts.keyboard: cordova plugin rm cordova-plugin-android-keyboard && cordova plugin add AndroidKeyboard && cordova build
scripts.navbar: cordova plugin rm cordova-plugin-android-navbarcolor && cordova plugin add AndroidNavBar && cordova build
scripts.callkit: cordova plugin rm cordova-plugin-android-callkit && cordova plugin add AndroidCallKit && cordova build
scripts.audiotoggle: cordova plugin rm cordova-plugin-audiotoggle && cordova plugin add AudioToggle && cordova build

author: Apache Cordova Team
